website_summaries.verdict: This sticker set contains an outstanding selection of themes to fit numerous holidays. However, the tradeoff is a few quality concerns.
pros: Includes stickers for many popular holidays, including some that aren't always in sticker sets such as the 4th of July, St. Patrick's Day, Thanksgiving, and Easter
Stickers are colorful and have iconic holiday characters and symbols
cons: Some stickers don't seem to have much adhesive, and tend to fall off the sheets before you are ready to use them
A few customers complain about the stickers having a strange odor

customer_reviews.title: Just stickers
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking under nail stickers. These popped up and I didn't look more closely. I was disappointed because they were not what I was looking for and Amazon put them in the wrong location. The stickers look like the pictures, but not small enough for nails.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley G. Burgoon

customer_reviews.title: A Year's Worth of Monthly Stickers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to liven up my Arc disc-bound monthly calendars. It's more fun to use a planner if it's festive and these are a great price for a year's worth of holiday stickers. Two full sheets for each set shown. I especially love the halloween and Christmas ones. Only con I have is some of the odder shapes need to be peeled carefully or they may rip, as do most stickers. Wish they also had a set for New Year's.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Horse Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stickers to use on my Happy Planner and I love them because I can decorate moths according to the holiday that is in that month. Brilliant colors and lovely stickers depicting the special day such as New Years Valentines and St Patrick’s etc.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had to provide holiday stickers for the teacher as part of her supply list. Half the class sends in holiday stickers, half send in general stickers. We found these and were really impressed with how nice they are -- the teacher liked them. Lots of colorful designs and high quality images.
customer_reviews.author: Irishlawlass

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: A nice variety of stickers, two sheets of each season and or major Holiday. However, some of the stickers just fall off the sheet when barely touched, which I don't like. Once removed from the sheet a few of them are difficult to peel from the adhesive backing. I also do not like the horrible smell I noticed when I opened the pack of stickers. I personally would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: holiday stickers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Satuday and arrived on Sunday. They were just what we wanted to put on our greeting cards for the various holidays. I would vary llkely use this vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: Cab4me

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Unique Assortment of Holiday Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Love and would recommend these stickers! The pack includes plenty of stickers of various sizes on each page for 8 different holidays which is a great buy for anyone's yearly sticker needs! I have seen other products that have stickers for the whole year but do not contain stickers for specific holidays. I have been using them on holiday cards and jazzing up care packages! The designs are cute and very unique and the stickers are easy to remove from the sheet! I would definitely buy them again and would recommend these to parents, teachers, or anyone who love stickers!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: WARNING NOT NAIL DECALS
customer_reviews.text: Well these were listed when I did a search for NAIL DECALS and they are absolutely not nail decals. It's is my fault for not looking at the description completely or the other reviews. I'll keep them only because I have a daughter that likes stickers, but Amazon should really correct this.
customer_reviews.author: Rockoncoolmom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to get off the paper, dont stick well at all and didnt come with all the holidays shown. What a HUGE disappointment and waste of $12!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Duffey

customer_reviews.title: Added Color to plain text
customer_reviews.text: This set of stickers has given me ample décor for my regular letter writing. I suppose they were well received. Doesn't really matter as they delighted me in the visual appeal they give to my typewritten letters.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Having fun with Sticker
customer_reviews.text: So enjoy the stickers, you can use them on your calendar which I do, to bring your attention to certain dates. For our anniversary I have put the little heart that says LOVE....Perfect...Let your imagination take you anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Lady Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got both products offered by this company. This product gives you a lot of variety in designs, sizes, and holidays. The stickers are a really good quality. The color and images are good, as is the paper quality. I have tried other stickers, but the sheets were too big and the stickers were too small. I like these because I get a lot of stickers, but there is not a lot of duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and you get 2 sheets of each style stickers. I'll be using these to make my planner pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mere

customer_reviews.title: Not for nails
customer_reviews.text: Search for holiday nail stickers! These came up they are not nail stickers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The stickers could be stickier, and they turned out to be a bit too cutesy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Description of product isnt correct
customer_reviews.text: Description said they are for nails! Theyre everything but that!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Calderon

customer_reviews.title: assorted sizes
customer_reviews.text: nice set, varies in size from very small (less than dime size) to quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Picture stickers are quite large. The set includes all major holidays. There are two sheets of stickers for each theme of the holiday. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: I love stickers and love to use them in my calendar ...
customer_reviews.text: I love stickers and love to use them in my calendar book. Makes finding special entries easier to find. FUN1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, festive full year of stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Great stickers to jazz up my planner! Excellent company to work with. Stickers were a bit bigger than I expected, but definitely not disappointed in that! Thick, but not overly heavy, durable stickers. Amazon did not deliver on time, however this is NO fault of the vendor. Amazon did refund my shipping fees. So, five stars all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: boilergal

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: The really jazz up my calendar. I love the assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Y Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great stickers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stickers. I used them for my planner and it worked pretty well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Uneven print with cut stickers outline
customer_reviews.text: The stickers aren't cut with the printed picture is. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: xjeska7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I searched for nail art stickers and this came up and it even says nail art. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great stickers two of each holiday. I'm ready to make cards.
customer_reviews.author: BARB

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of stickers - includes two of each sheet shown. Easy to peel off from backing and seem to stick well.The graphics are fun and suitable for many holidays.
customer_reviews.author: I.K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great holiday stickers for your planners :))). Or wherever you like to use stickers :)
customer_reviews.author: SallySigns

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not nail art.
customer_reviews.text: Searched for nail art stickers and these were one of the results. Was extremely disappointed to find they were not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: guppy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute stickers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, bright, and cheery. Great price for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jeraldine M. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice quality and I got every holiday exactly what I asked for
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are so cute and vibrant. Happy addition to my holiday cards :)
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: poor choice
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in variety of the stickers Would not have purchased if I had seen them first
customer_reviews.author: Judy Watson

customer_reviews.title: In wrong place
customer_reviews.text: was listed under nail art and definatley just kid stickers
customer_reviews.author: amanda hooven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and crafting
customer_reviews.text: These are great stickers. Perfect for kids and scrap booking. Good variety on the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety & number of stickers
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are Best friends since childhood, Bucky Barnes and Steven Rogers were inseparable on both schoolyard and battlefield-. I like the variety and the amount of stickers. I did find them to be a little bit flimsy. As some are hard to peel away from the backing, you can end up ripping them due to the flimsiness. I was able to use them to decorate a giant wall calendar with only minimal loss of stickers, lol. My children had a harder time but nothing so much as to make them become upset or terribly frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: HSSAHMof7

customer_reviews.title: Cute stickers but thin and easily tear
customer_reviews.text: The Stickers are cute but a bit thin and easily tear when my 2 yr old is pulling them off the page. I like that there are 2 sets for each holiday, I feel like as long as I can keep track of these they will bring at least 2 years worth of crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Defect
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are great and everything but the package says 16 sheets of stickers but only contained 15. Kind of annoying. Only received one summer sticker sheet
customer_reviews.author: Maude

customer_reviews.title: great stickers
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them on a wipe off Calendar. I stick them on a white price circle and a magnet on the back. I love using them for holiday syllables.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sticker Collection!
customer_reviews.text: I used those while making a scrapbook of my great-nephew...I truly loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Boling

product_meta.title: Koobar Year-Round Holiday Stickers Variety Pack: Fun Assortment of Designs for a Whole Year (400+ Stickers)
product_meta.description: Koobar's year-round variety pack includes fun and modern designs for every holiday. With a variety of shapes and sizes, and over 400 stickers, this sticker pack has something to offer for any holiday or season. Includes two (2) sheets of each of the following: Valentine's Day, St. Patrick's Day, Easter, Beach/Summer, July 4th, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas
feature_bullets: Includes two sheets of eight different design themes for a total of 16 sheets and 400+ stickers.
Wide variety of sticker sizes (up to 1.5") means you'll have the right sticker for any place.
Sticker sheets measure 6"x10", making them easy to store or share with others.
Ideal for kids, teachers, scrapbookers, calendars, holiday fun, or just a general assortment that will delight any sticker enthusiast.
Great way to decorate your planner.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
